nodes.text: Jedi Wisdom Tokens were souvenirs sold at Dok-Ondar's Den of Antiquities in Black Spire Outpost on the planet Batuu during the war with between the First Order and the Resistance. The tokens consisted of a light gray rock with either the emblem of the Jedi Order or the face of a famous Jedi, such as Grand Master Yoda, on one side and a piece of Jedi wisdom written in either aurebesh or High Galactic on the other.
Jedi Wisdom Tokens first appeared as products available in Dok-Ondar's Den of Antiquities in Star Wars: Galaxy's Edge, which opened to guests at Disneyland Park on May 31, 2019.
